TopicTitle: Did they nerf the Rapier? v0.1.2.0

Articles.Content:
My space plane went from 0.700 weight to Lift ratio to 0.400 and can hardly get off the runway after Patch v0.1.2.0

Any one else experiencing this? - I had a Spaceplane that was capable of getting into orbit and down again, i was fiddling with getting the right amount of Monopropellant and trying to find 500 more Delta V - but now it seems i'm back to square one?
I have one with a single rapier that is performing the same after the patch (500 m/s dV left once in LKO) as before. The ascent went exactly the same for what it’s worth.
Hmmm.. I will have to tinker. Any way, thank you for your reply.

Update:

Definitely feels like the aerodynamics has changed.. When i did the re-entry my craft that glided pretty well before just fell like a stone  

Although - I did had a lot of control issues coming in through the atmosphere.. so maybe i just got into an unrecoverable dive. At least Jeb bailed in time.
